ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Question for Rokenn
ygData.msgSnippet: We got bladestorm(s?) by  pulling I-3 mobs too close to their social (agro) range.  We d pull something and get the something and a bladestorm.  Sorry that s
ygData.messageBody:
We got bladestorm(s?) by pulling I-3 mobs too close to their social (agro)
range. We'd pull something and get the something and a bladestorm. Sorry
that's kinda vague but I did not see what exactly they were doing and the
discussion was about pulling too close to the edge of that side of the
island.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Gillan [mailto:ggillan@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 9:44 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Question for Rokenn

From: Greg Gillan <ggillan@...>

Okay, next question. Anyone know the "trick" to get the
blades to leave?
Or any clue as to how this might be done?


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 10:31 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Question for Rokenn


From: "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...>

We had tried pulling Dojorn to the 3rd isle with no luck as
well (back in
the levitating days of Air). Now we take him on on his own
isle. One of
the Paladin's in our guild has found a way to trick the two
Bladestorms into
leaving the island so we are able to fight Dojorn solo. I
will try to
observe his techinique next time he go up there. The full
loot list from
Dojorn last night was a Warrior haste belt, Golden Efreeti
Bow (ranger quest
item), and Golden Efreeti Greeves. On our first Dojorn
kill we got 4 items
but 3 rotted due to confusion in the post-kill rezing order.
This time we
did pre-lotto rolls per class for whatever dropped, saved
alot of trouble in
that precious 8 mins post-kill time.

Also Dojorn is pretty much immune to magic. So it is melee,
melee, melee.
Our group got waxed as BOTH our healers went LD as soon as
the battle
started :( We had about 45 people there I believe.

Rokenn
